S:log-item.D:comment: DERBY-2228 Ensure that the J2SE data value factory is not booted with J2ME/CDC/Foundation 1.1 which does include java.math.BigDecimal. The J2SE DVF also assumes that JDBC 2.0 is supported in that it calls setBigDecimal and getBigDecimal methods. Check also that java.sql.Driver is supported which indicates that JDBC 2.0 or higher is supported. Merge of revision 496567 from trrunk
